title: Solo per veri sinistri nostalgici.

embed.description: NOTE: Some of the Q and W Particles aren't finished with the blade landing/throwing up! Showing off all the Katarina skins for her new update as part of the League of Legends Assassin Update Classic Katarina, Mercenary Katarina, Red Card Katarina, Bilgewater Katarina, Kitty Cat Katarina, High Command Katarina, Sandstorm Katarina, Slay Belle Katarina, Warring Kingdoms Katarina and PROJECT: Katarina are included in the video.

body:
A quanti manca la vecchia animazione di acciaio sinistro?
Ancora presente con la skin Bilgewater in questo video (4:23 poi ovviamente rimossa).

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZlwV605tsHI

Rendeva sicuramente quella skin qualcosa di più particolare e individuale..{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} {{champion:32}} {{champion:412}}
